answers.answer: Hello,Unintentional weight loss is a manifestation of illness.It may be due to anorexia,bulimia,Addison’s disease,depression,stress and anxiety,diabetes,hyperthyroidism, bowel obstruction or gastrointestinal causes,malabsorption,infections(parasites) or malignancies.Tingling sensation can be due to diabetes,thyroid disease,vit B 12 deficiency and neurological problems.Without examination,confirming a diagnosis is tough.I sincerely advise you to consult a physician and discuss these possibilities with him.In the absence of any disease,weight loss can be due to undue stress.Pls stop taking stress if you are having any and also avoid eating junk food.Healthy nutritious diet and moderate exercises are the formula for a good health.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional doubts.
